sub-category.name: Phase 0
sub-category.content: hardware is a very expensive experiment; no operating systems exist

sub-category.name: Phase 3
sub-category.content: hardware is very cheap, humans are expensive

sub-category.name: Modern operating systems
sub-category.content: are enormous, complex, and poorly understood

category.name: Tradeoffs
category.content: None of these operating systems were particularly bad; each depended on tradeoffs made at that point in time
